item.title: Verifying UML profiled models - User Guide
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Eclipse Foundation)
item.description: Verifying UML profiled models - User Guide By Freddy Allilaire (INRIA), RÃ©mi Schnekenburger (CEA LIST) May 2007 This user guide explains how to configure and launch the Verifying UML profiled models ATL service in Papyrus. User Guide The following procedure will configure and launch the transformation that validates the model against previously defined rules. First step is to create a new transformation configuration, using the Run As button. Thanks to the pop-up menu available on Papyrus transformation, you can create a new transformation configuration.
